Sentece: Total body clearance averaged 106 L/h and was independent of dose.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of rimexolone after intra-articular administration.
Name: Rimexolone

Sentece: The mean residence time of rimexolone in the knee joint is very long and averaged 25 days.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of rimexolone after intra-articular administration.
Name: Rimexolone
